job-description: React Native App Development: Led the development of a white-labeled React Native app, integrating features like dynamic branding, Firebase, and Fastlane automation.
Navigation and Maps Integration: Implemented navigation features, including Drawer, Stack, and Bottom Tab navigation, with maps integration and random marker placement.
Branding and Versioning: Managed branding switches and build/version automation with Fastlane to cater to multiple brand configurations.
Pilot Training App Development: Developed multiple aviation-related forms and streamlined data entry processes for airline pilot training using React Native.
Calendar Integration: Built a calendar event page for scheduling pilot training sessions, improving user experience and efficiency.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Worked closely with the design and backend teams to ensure smooth app functionality and user interface.
Developed and Maintained Mobile App Features: Worked on the Trifit mobile application, specifically focusing on the login and user profile sections, using React Native.
State Management: Utilized Redux to manage the state effectively and ensure seamless user interactions.
Backend Development: Collaborated on backend tasks, integrating APIs and ensuring smooth communication between the frontend and backend systems.
